original: Bodin, Sven Johannes Wilhelm, postmästare, Göteborg, f. 21/10/84 i Tvärred, Älvsb. 1., av köpm. A. W. B. o. Dina Pettersson. G. 16 m. Clary Edgardh, d. 46. Barn: Sven Yngve Lennart f. 20, banktjänsteman, Gbg. — Stud. v. Gbgs h. latin. Anst. i postv. sed. 05, postexp. i Gbg 10, post-assist. där 25, tf. förste postassist. i Gbg 33, förste postassist. där s, å., kontr. där 38, postmäst. i Gbg sed. 43. Led. av styr. f. Understödsfören. Gbgs postmannakassa sed. 12, led. av o. sekr. i styr. f. Gbgs sekt. av Postmäst :fören. sed. 43, v. ordf. i pens:-ndn f. Gbgs stads 14 :e pens :distr. sed. 32. GM 8 st.
translated: Bodin, Sven Johannes Wilhelm, postmaster, Gothenburg, born 21/10/84 in Tvärred, Älvsborg County, son of merchant A.W.B. and Dina Pettersson. Married in 1916 to Clary Edgardh who passed away in 1946. Children: Sven Yngve Lennart, born in 1920, bank clerk in Gothenburg. Studied at Gothenburg High Latin School in postal services and worked as a postal clerk in Gothenburg since 1910. Became a temporary senior postal clerk in Gothenburg in 1925, senior postal assistant in the same year, postmaster in Gothenburg in 1943, and superintendent in 1948. He is a member of the board of directors for the Gothenburg Postal Workers' Assistance Fund since 1912, and a member and secretary of the board of directors for the Gothenburg section of the Postmaster's Association since 1943. He also serves as vice-chair of the pension committee for the 14th district of the Gothenburg city pension office since 1932. He has received the medal of eight of the highest class.

award.name: Medal of Eight of the Highest Class
